name: Hilldale Street
description: A pristine street in the heart of Hilldale. You are on a quiet, tree-lined street in Hilldale, where every house looks like it was plucked from the pages of a home and garden magazine. The lawns are impossibly green, the cars in the driveways are brand new, and the silence is almost deafening, broken only by the distant whir of a lawnmower. It's the kind of place where nothing ever seems to go wrong, which, in Hill Valley, is usually a sign that something is about to. To the west, the entrance to Hilldale, and to the east, more of the same.
